location.description: Downtown location with easy access to local amenities

specs.layout: Open concept with high ceilings, beautiful wood detailing, and bohemian modern furniture

availability.note: Availability should be dynamically determined - check Furnished Finder interface for current dates

house_rules.accessibility: Stairs at entrance and/or inside property

property_details.description: This beautiful 800 square foot craftsman loft apartment is not only in a great location but has everything you need for an unforgettable stay. This studio apartment is situated in downtown Lander Wyoming. It features an open kitchen, high ceilings, beautiful wood detailing, and bohemian modern furniture. We take cleanliness seriously, and sanitation is our number one priority. Our professional cleaner ensures your safety.

highlight: Fully furnished craftsman loft with modern amenities

common_questions.pets: Yes, pets are welcome! We require a $400 refundable pet deposit.
common_questions.parking: Free parking is available on premises.
common_questions.utilities: All utilities are included in the monthly rent of $1,200.
common_questions.internet: WiFi is included. The Smart TV is available but streaming services require your own login.
common_questions.cleaning: A $100 cleaning fee applies. We maintain high sanitation standards with professional cleaning.
common_questions.availability: Please check current availability on Furnished Finder as dates may change.
